trans-unit.source: Provides support for communication between UI Automation providers and UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Gir støtte for kommunikasjon mellom Brukergrensesnittet Automation leverandører og Brukergrensesnittet Automation klienten programmer.

trans-unit.source: Contains a value that, when returned as the first element of the array passed by the UI Automation provider to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.GetRuntimeId*>, indicates that the ID is partial and should be appended to the ID provided by the base provider.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en verdi som når returnert som det første elementet i matrisen som er sendt av Brukergrensesnittet Automation leverandøren til <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.GetRuntimeId*>, indikerer at IDen er delvis og skal føyes til den angitte av base leverandøren IDen.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.GetRuntimeId*>

trans-unit.source: This field is typically used in the implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.GetRuntimeId%2A> for elements in a fragment that are not directly hosted in a window.
trans-unit.target: Dette feltet brukes vanligvis i implementeringen av <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.GetRuntimeId%2A>for elementer i et fragment som ikke lagres direkte i et vindu.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.GetRuntimeId%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether any UI Automation client application is subscribed to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] events.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om klientprogrammet noen Brukergrensesnittet Automation som abonnerer på [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] hendelser.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a client is subscribed to events; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en klient som abonnerer på hendelser; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a UI Automation provider that represents the specified window.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en Brukergrensesnittet Automation leverandør som representerer det angitte vinduet.

trans-unit.source: The interface returned by this method can only be passed back to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Grensesnittet returneres av denne metoden kan bare sendes til [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Attempting to call a method on the interface will raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å kalle en metode i grensesnittet vil vise et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The handle of the window.
trans-unit.target: Behandlingen av vinduet.

trans-unit.source: The raw element provider for the specified window.
trans-unit.target: Raw element-leverandør for det angitte vinduet.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of events to send before batching.
trans-unit.target: Angir maksimalt antall hendelser skal sendes før satsvis kjøring.

trans-unit.source: This value determines whether notification is given of individual events such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType> or of bulk events such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType>.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien bestemmer om varsling er angitt for individuelle hendelser for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType>eller bulk hendelser for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of events to send before batching for items in containers.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall hendelser skal sendes før bunkebehandling for elementer i beholdere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Raises a pattern event or a custom event.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer et mønster-hendelse eller en egendefinert hendelse.

trans-unit.source: Pattern events should not be raised just by a pattern implementation.
trans-unit.target: Skal ikke oppstå mønsteret hendelser ved implementering av mønsteret.

trans-unit.source: For example, an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePatternIdentifiers.InvokedEvent> should be raised whenever the control is invoked, either through <xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePattern.Invoke%2A> or through mouse or keyboard input.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en <xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePatternIdentifiers.InvokedEvent>skal oppstå når kontrollen aktiveres, enten gjennom <xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePattern.Invoke%2A>eller via musen inndata eller tastatur.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePattern.Invoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePatternIdentifiers.InvokedEvent>

trans-unit.source: In this way, clients can be informed about system events.
trans-unit.target: På denne måten kan klienter bli informert om system-hendelser.

trans-unit.source: The event identifier.
trans-unit.target: Hendelses-IDen.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: Elementet for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Information about the event.
trans-unit.target: Informasjon om hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raises an event when a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer en hendelse når en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] -egenskapen er endret.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: Elementet for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Information about the event.
trans-unit.target: Informasjon om hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raises an event when the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree has changed.
trans-unit.target: Viser en hendelsen når den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tre er endret.

trans-unit.source: An example of a change in the tree structure is child elements being added to or removed from a list box, or being expanded or collapsed in a tree view.
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel på en endring i treet blir underordnede elementer som legges til eller fjernes fra en liste eller utvides eller skjules i en trevisningen.

trans-unit.source: When a child element is removed, the runtime identifier of either the element, or of its container, is passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangedEventArgs> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Når et underordnet element er fjernet, identifikatoren for kjøring av enten elementet eller beholderen, er sendt til den <xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangedEventArgs>konstruktør.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: In the current version of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)], however, there is no easy way for an instance of a provider to discover its runtime identifier.
trans-unit.target: I gjeldende versjon av [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)], men det finnes ingen enkel måte for en forekomst av en leverandør til å finne den runtime identifikatoren.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.GetRuntimeId%2A> method normally returns an array that contains <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.AppendRuntimeId>, a magic number that instructs the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] system to create a unique identifer for every instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.GetRuntimeId%2A>metoden vanligvis returnerer en matrise som inneholder <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.AppendRuntimeId>, en magiske tallet som angir at det [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] systemet for å opprette en unik identifikator for hver forekomst av kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.AppendRuntimeId> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.GetRuntimeId%2A>

trans-unit.source: The raw value provided by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.GetRuntimeId%2A> should not be used in events, because it is meaningless to clients and cannot be used to identify a specific instance.
trans-unit.target: Raw-verdien som er angitt av <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.GetRuntimeId%2A>må ikke brukes i hendelser, fordi den meningsløst til klienter og kan ikke brukes til å finne en bestemt forekomst.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.GetRuntimeId%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because of this limitation, events of type <xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType> and <xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType> are not very useful.
trans-unit.target: På grunn av denne begrensningen hendelser av typen <xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType>og <xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType>er svært nyttige.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, always use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType> and <xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType>, passing 0 as the runtime identifer.
trans-unit.target: Som et alternativ alltid bruke <xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType>og <xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType>, sende 0 som runtime-identifikator.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType>

trans-unit.source: You cannot use `null`, as this will raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke bruke `null`, fordi dette vil vise et unntak.

trans-unit.source: Clients will be notified that a change has been made in the container (identified by the `sender` parameter passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangedEventHandler>), without specific notice of what children have been added or removed.
trans-unit.target: Klienter, vil bli varslet om at en endring er gjort i beholderen (identifisert av den `sender` -parameteren sendt til den <xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangedEventHandler>), uten bestemte varsel om hvilken underordnede har lagt til eller fjernet.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The element associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: Elementet for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Information about the event.
trans-unit.target: Informasjon om hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Returns the UI automation provider for an element in response to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_WM_GETOBJECT" name="WM_GETOBJECT" href=""></xref> message.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer Brukergrensesnittet automation leverandøren for et element som svar på en <xref uid="langword_csharp_WM_GETOBJECT" name="WM_GETOBJECT" href=""> </xref> meldingen.

trans-unit.source: Handle of the element's window.
trans-unit.target: Håndtering av elementets-vinduet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_wParam" name="wParam" href=""></xref> member of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_WM_GETOBJECT " name="WM_GETOBJECT " href=""></xref>message.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_wParam" name="wParam" href=""> </xref> medlem av den <xref uid="langword_csharp_WM_GETOBJECT " name="WM_GETOBJECT " href=""> </xref>meldingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_lParam" name="lParam" href=""></xref> member of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_WM_GETOBJECT" name="WM_GETOBJECT" href=""></xref> message.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_lParam" name="lParam" href=""> </xref> medlem av den <xref uid="langword_csharp_WM_GETOBJECT" name="WM_GETOBJECT" href=""> </xref> meldingen.

trans-unit.source: The UI Automation provider for the element.
trans-unit.target: Automation UI-leverandøren for elementet.

trans-unit.source: A pointer to data that should be assigned to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Result*> before passing the message to the base window procedure.
trans-unit.target: En peker til data som skal tilordnes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Result*>før sending av meldingen til base vindusprosedyre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Result*>

trans-unit.source: Contains a value used in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_lParam" name="lParam" href=""></xref> member of a <xref uid="langword_csharp_WM_GETOBJECT" name="WM_GETOBJECT" href=""></xref> message, indicating that the server should return a reference to the root raw element provider.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en verdi som brukes i den <xref uid="langword_csharp_lParam" name="lParam" href=""> </xref> medlem av en <xref uid="langword_csharp_WM_GETOBJECT" name="WM_GETOBJECT" href=""> </xref> meldingen, indikerer at serveren skal returnere en referanse til roten raw elementet leverandøren.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
